alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 14 at 9:00PM AKST until February 15 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Reduced visibilities to one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel conditions, with whiteout conditions at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A new front will bring another round of strong winds and snowfall to the Pribilof Islands on Wednesday. Gusty southeasterly winds are expected to peak Wednesday afternoon before diminishing in the evening. Snowfall will likely be heaviest Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon before precipitation transitions to a rain/snow mix in the evening.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
